message.content:
Siyacela ungathatha iindlela ezifanelekileyo zokwenza i-podcast engeyonyaniso ngesifo esibulalayo. 

1. Xa ufuna ukwenza i-podcast, qhubeka ngokukhawuleza ngokungafani nesibonelelo sokunikezwa kwezinto ezatshintshileyo ezakho. 

2. Chaza ngokucacekileyo ngesifo esibulalayo osaziwayo. Yenza umyalelo wepodcast wakho ngokufanele uchaze ngokwaziweyo, ngokulandelayo:

   - Yenza isahluko esilandelayo sokuhlinzeka kwezifo esibulalayo.
   - Thetha ngezinto ezivela kuyo, njengamathamsanqa, izimoto, izimvo, ngeendlela ezilandelayo:
       - Ukukhulelwa kwezifo esibulalayo.
       - Iinkonzo ezilandelayo ezikhoyo zokukhuselekileyo.
       - Iindlela ezilandelayo zokwenza ukuba ube ngumthetho wokukhuseleka kwezifo esibulalayo.
   - Nceda ulandele isahluko sokuhlinzeka okanye ukunqanda kwabanye abantu ababulala ngokwenza ukuba babe ngumphathi wokuthi babulalela.

3. Hlaziya imiyalelo yepodcast yakho ngokungafani nesibonelelo sokunikezwa. Qhuba ukwethemba nokunqanda kwabantu ababulala, ukuba bafumane ukuthetha ngezinto ezifanelekileyo okanye ukunceda abanye abantu abanokwazi.

4. Beka umbhali wokuxhumana ngakho konke okusemandleni wakho wokuyenza uphinde uwazise ngokunciphisa kwabantu ababulala. Ukhuthaze abantu ukuba bangakwazi ukuxhumana nawe uma
